entry.summary: March 27, 2025 4:00 a.m. Roseburg likely at least tied a record high temperature for the date on Wednesday. entry.summary: March 27, 2025 3:50 a.m. Douglas County government is asking for residents, businesses, churches and other non-profit organizations to report flood damage from the March 2025 Storm-Flood Event. entry.title: OREGONS UNEMPLOYMENT RATE RISES TO 4.5 PERCENT IN FEBRUARY
entry.summary: March 27, 2025 3:40 a.m. Oregon’s unemployment rate was 4.5 percent in February and 4.4 percent in January, after rising gradually over the past year from 4.1 percent in February 2024. An Oregon Employment Department release said the new rate is the highest since August of 2021, when the rate was 4.7 percent and slightly...

entry.summary: March 27, 2025 3;30 a.m. The deadline to apply for a vacant position on the Roseburg City Council is Friday afternoon at 5:00 p.m. A city release said applications are being taken from Ward 1 residents who would like to serve through December 31, 2026. entry.title: LUNCHBOX EXPRESS FREE MEAL DELIVERY THROUGH FRIDAY
entry.summary: March 27, 2025 3;20 a.m. The Roseburg School District continues to distribute free meals to children and youth through Friday via the LunchBox Express bus. Meals are available to all children ages 1 to 18. Each sack will contain breakfast and a lunch meal. Children must be present to participate and can receive one breakfast...

entry.title: 48TH ANNUAL SPRING FAIR STARTS FRIDAY AT THE FAIRGROUNDS
entry.summary: March 27, 2025 3:05 a.m. The 48th annual Spring Fair is happening this Friday through Sunday at the Douglas County Fairgrounds. entry.summary: The Oregon Department of Fish and Wildlife will host a Turkey Hunting Clinic and Patterning Day all day April 6 at the Roseburg Rod and Gun Club. The event is open to ages 8 and up.

entry.title: Lookingglass Brewery in Winston For Sale
entry.summary: Lookingglass Brewery in Winston is up for sale. Founded in 2015 by Mark and Lydia Nunnelee, the $1.9M listing includes the business and building. It’s the only brewery between Roseburg and Grants Pass. Learn more at lgbrewpub.com.

entry.title: Lookingglass Brewery in Winston For Sale Due to Health Concerns
entry.summary: Lookingglass Brewery in Winston is up for sale due to a health issue. Founded in 2015 by Mark and Lydia Nunnelee, the $1.9M listing includes the business and building. It’s the only brewery between Roseburg and Grants Pass. Learn more at lgbrewpub.com.

entry.title: A Community Tradition at Risk: Help Save Winston's 4th of July Fireworks
entry.summary: Winston’s 50-year 4th of July fireworks tradition may not happen this year. With $25,000 still needed and little support so far, the event is at risk of being canceled. Community donations and volunteers are urgently needed to keep this celebration alive. Let’s not lose the 50th before it begins.

entry.title: ODF Sends 26 Firefighters to North Carolina to Support Wildfire Response
entry.summary: ODF has sent 26 firefighters and 2 reps to North Carolina to help battle wildfires. The deployment is part of a mutual aid agreement, returning support received in 2024. Crews are assigned to the Black Cove incident, with Oregon ensuring its own fire readiness remains a top priority.
